venue.address_1: Eastern Point Boulevard at Farrington Avenue
venue.name: Eastern Point

item.description:
What: Gloucester Schooner Mayor's Race
When: 8:30 a.m. and we'll hope to be on a shuttle to Eastern Point by 9:00 a.m. to get in position.
Where: We'll met at the Eastern Point Gate (Eastern Point Boulevard at Farrington Avenue) and take the shuttle bus to Eastern Point Light.

Special Note: Parking is difficult. Speaking from experience... don't park in resident sticker parking areas unless you have a sticker. I drove the car without a sticker last year and it cost me a $75 parking ticket. Arrive early, or email me and we can setup a meeting place to carpool from.


9:00 a.m. - 12:30 p.m.
Shuttle Bus to Eastern Point Light, from Eastern Point Gate (Eastern Point Boulevard at Farrington Avenue) to watch the start of the Mayor's Race. Free of Charge.

11:00 a.m.
Start of Mayor's Race for Esperanto Cup, Ned Cameron Trophy and Betty Ramsey Trophy off Eastern Point.

Schooner Festival


Suggestions for what to bring:

Camera gear
Jacket if it's cool in the morning
Bottled water or morning beverage of your choice
item.name: Gloucester Schooner Mayor's Race
